states.Description:
You awaken in a dark room. There is an exit North.
What would you like to do?
This is your cell. You woke up here some time ago. It is dark, and you cannot see anything.
This is your cell. You woke up here some time ago. With your torch, you can see something small gleaming on the floor.
This is your cell. You woke up here some time ago. You found an onyx ring on the floor here.

commands.ReplyText: It is dark, and you cannot see anything.
You already found an onyx ring on the floor. There is nothing else here.
You take an onyx ring from the floor of your cell. You know it is capable of fire magic. Perhaps it was yours?

items.Description: an onyx ring capable of fire magic
